title: White Medium Small Square

adjectives: Forming a right angle, especially at right angles with the mast or the keel, and parallel to the horizon; said of the yards of a square-rigged vessel when they are so braced.
Having four equal sides and four right angles or forming a right angle

description: A medium-small-sized square shaded completely white. Smaller than the White Large Square and White Medium Square but larger than the White Small Square.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's white medium-small square emoji features a clean, crisp white surface with a subtle, almost imperceptible gloss that suggests a tactile, three-dimensional form. Its edges are perfectly rounded, adhering to Apple's design language for a smooth and modern aesthetic. On Apple devices, this emoji serves as a versatile building block in visual communication, often used for creating patterns, indicating selections, or simply adding a minimalist visual element that complements other content with Apple's signature clarity.
